text: "Two Tickets to Paradise" is a 1978 song by American singer Eddie Money. It was taken from his debut self-titled studio album Eddie Money. It went to number 14 in Canada and number 22 in the United States. It has become a staple on classic rock radio stations. == References == Category:1978 songs Category:Eddie Money songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Power pop songs
title: Two Tickets to Paradise
